document.full_text: president laurent gbagbo, widely regarded as having lost last year's election, has nonetheless managed to maintain power, in part by taking over the lucrative trade in cocoa.
document.title: news analysis: with ivory coast crippled by sanctions, a leader still holds on
lines_and_colors: president laurent gbagbo, widely regarded as having lost last year's election, has nonetheless managed to maintain power, in part by taking over the lucrative trade in cocoa.
